glsa.title: LIVE555 Media Server: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A Denial of Service vulnerability has been reported in LIVE555 Media Server.

background.p: LIVE555 Media Server is a set of libraries for multimedia streaming.

description.p: Luigi Auriemma reported a signedness error in the parseRTSPRequestString() function when processing short RTSP queries.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted RTSP query to the vulnerable server, resulting in a crash.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All LIVE555 Media Server users should upgrade to the latest version:
Note: Due to ABI changes, applications built against LIVE555 Media Server such as VLC or MPlayer should also be rebuilt.
